00028 #ifndef ABSTRACTCELLMUTATIONSTATE_HPP_
00029 #define ABSTRACTCELLMUTATIONSTATE_HPP_
00030 
00031 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00032 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00033 
00048 class AbstractCellMutationState
00049 {
00050 private:
00051 
00055     unsigned mCellCount;
00056 
00060     unsigned mColour;
00061 
00063     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00070     template<class Archive>
00071     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00072     {
00073         // If Archive is an output archive, then '&' resolves to '<<'
00074         // If Archive is an input archive, then '&' resolves to '>>'
00075         archive & mCellCount;
00076         archive & mColour;
00077     }
00078 
00083     AbstractCellMutationState();
00084 
00085 public:
00086 
00092     AbstractCellMutationState(unsigned colour);
00093 
00097     virtual ~AbstractCellMutationState();
00098 
00106     template<class SUBCLASS>
00107     bool IsType() const
00108     {
00109         // We put a const_cast in here so users don't have to worry about whether the
00110         // mutation object they are testing is const or not.
00111         SUBCLASS* p_subclass = dynamic_cast<SUBCLASS*>(const_cast<AbstractCellMutationState*>(this));
00112         return (p_subclass != NULL);
00113     }
00114 
00119     bool IsSame(AbstractCellMutationState* pOther);
00120 
00125     bool IsSame(boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellMutationState> pOther);
00126 
00130     void IncrementCellCount();
00131 
00135     void DecrementCellCount();
00136 
00140     unsigned GetCellCount() const;
00141 
00145     unsigned GetColour() const;
00146 };
